attributes.action: recognise the 100th Anniversary of RMS Titanic at the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello its only 5 years until the 100th anniversary of when the Titanic sank.

I feel that there should be some kind of commemoration for this especially at the 2012 Olympics. Could a symbol of this be reflected at the Olympics. an exhibition of some kind?

Titanic was the largest passenger steamship in the world at the time of her sinking, and she is infamous throughout the world. 

She was built in Belfast and made her maiden voyage from the UK.

The United Kingdom should be doing the most to remember her on this anniversary the most, and it would be a major tribute to have something the world will recognise at the Olympics.
